articles.description: The pair provided a rare positive in their partnership at Brighton a couple of weekends ago, with both getting their first goal of the season in their first league start
articles.content:
Leicester City could deploy a strike partnership again after Patson Daka and Kelechi Iheanacho provided a rare positive last time out.
